contents: 使用extra扩展点，可以在头部右侧追加内容

highlighted.content:
import Card from 'kpc/components/card';
import {Row, Col} from 'kpc/components/grid';
import {Tabs, Tab} from 'kpc/components/tabs';

<div>
    <Card title="用户信息">
        <b:extra>
            <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
            </Tabs>
        </b:extra>
        <Row>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
        </Row>
    </Card>
    <Card title="用户信息" type="border">
        <b:extra>
            <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
            </Tabs>
        </b:extra>
        <Row>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
        </Row>
    </Card>
</div>

.k-card
    margin-bottom 16px
    .k-tabs
        border none
    &.k-border
        .k-tabs
            height 48px
            line-height 46px

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';
import './index.styl'; 

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Card title="用户信息">
            <template slot="extra">
                <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                    <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                    <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
                </Tabs>
            </template>
            <Row>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            </Row>
        </Card>
        <Card title="用户信息" type="border">
            <template slot="extra">
                <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                    <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                    <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
                </Tabs>
            </template>
            <Row>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
            </Row>
        </Card>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Card from 'kpc/components/card';
import {Row, Col} from 'kpc/components/grid';
import {Tabs, Tab} from 'kpc/components/tabs';

export default {
    components: {
        Card, Row, Col, Tabs, Tab
    },
}
</script>
<style lang="stylus" src="./index.styl"></style>

import React from 'react';
import Card from 'kpc/components/card';
import {Row, Col} from 'kpc/components/grid';
import {Tabs, Tab} from 'kpc/components/tabs';
import './index.styl';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Card title="用户信息"
                    b-extra={<React.Fragment>
                        <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                            <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                            <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
                        </Tabs>
                    </React.Fragment>}
                >
                    <Row>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                    </Row>
                </Card>
                <Card title="用户信息" type="border"
                    b-extra={<React.Fragment>
                        <Tabs value="1" size="small">
                            <Tab value="1">数据集成</Tab>
                            <Tab value="2">数据采集</Tab>
                        </Tabs>
                    </React.Fragment>}
                >
                    <Row>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                        <Col span="8">登录账号：test</Col>
                    </Row>
                </Card>
            </div>
        )
    }
}
